content:
Hi 6.100A teaching team,

I am Yixin Tang, a Harvard GSE master's student. This is my first semester at Cambridge so things were kind of crazy. It took me a while to get my head around how the classes work. Because of my carelessness in reading the grading policy, I thought that the checkoffs were optional and didn't do the checkoffs for Pset1 and 2.

I attended every lecture, finished all microquizzes, and submitted all Psets before the due date, so I haven't used any late days yet. I am planning on applying for Ph.D. so I really need a good grade. I have finished the checkoffs for Pset3 and 4 and I plead with you that I could make up at least the Pset2 checkoff (I saw question129 and the instructor said 'you can also use a late day'. https://piazza.com/class/l5s90ip6zjd5tz/post/129 )  

I am so sorry for causing extra trouble and it's my bad not reading through the course info carefully. I would really appreciate it if I am given a chance to make up things. I understand this week people are busy submitting Pset4 and the TAs will be busy with Pset3&4 checkoffs, so whatever time works for the TAs I am good. 

Thank you so much and looking forward to your response!

Sincerely,

Yixin Tang
subject: Late Pset1&2 Checkoffs

content: @Ana Bell guessing the answer is no
I'm sorry but we must stick to the policy we outlined in the course info and in the first lecture. We can't offer the late checkoff but will make a note of this for when we do final grades.
Thank you so much! I really really appreciate the note and I will try my best for the final! Thanks a lot for your kind consideration again!
